examples.korean: You coward! What are you afraid of? 발음듣기 이 겁쟁이! 뭐가 무서운 거야? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You coward! What are you afraid of? 발음

examples.korean: The rainforests are disappearing at an alarming rate. 발음듣기 열대우림이 무서운 속도로 사라지고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rainforests are disappearing at an alarming rate. 발음

examples.korean: After the winter rains, the stream becomes a raging torrent. 발음듣기 겨울비가 내린 후에는 개울물이 무서운 기세로 흐르는 급류가 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After the winter rains, the stream becomes a raging torrent. 발음

examples.korean: What are you frightened of? 발음듣기 넌 뭐가 무서운 거니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What are you frightened of? 발음

examples.korean: It was a really scary moment. 발음듣기 그건 정말 무서운 순간이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
